Narayan Sahu, graphic [...] I am excited and incredibly grateful to announce that I have accepted a full-time offer to join BTIG as an Algorithmic Trading Analyst in the Electronic Trading division following graduation! I will be working out of BTIG's New York City office starting this summer. I am eagerly looking forward to contributing to BTIG's mission and delivering exceptional results while deepening my understanding of financial markets and refining my quantitative skills.

[...] I am excited to share that I have been accepted into the Break Through Tech AI Program at Massachusetts Institute of Technology's Schwarzman College of Computing for Summer 2022, Fall 2022, and Spring 2023. The program will require me to attend in-person labs and lectures at MIT once a week and attend online lectures as well. I am looking forward to using this amazing opportunity to develop my skills in Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, and Data Science as well as to build useful projects using several AI and ML tools. I am also looking forward to networking with leaders in these fascinating fields and getting one step closer to breaking into the world of AI and ML!
#datascience #machinelearning #tech #artificialintelligence #technology #ml #computing #ai #mit #breakthroughtech [...] Agree & Join LinkedIn

# Arjun Kejriwal‚Äôs Post

View profile for Arjun Kejriwal [...] I am excited and incredibly grateful to announce that I have accepted an offer to join Citi as a Sales & Trading Summer Analyst in New York City for Summer 2023. The program will give me the opportunity to actively participate in the research, trading, and marketing of securities to Citi's institutional client base. The program will also include several rotations across different products and trading desks such as equity markets, derivative markets, quantitative research/analysis, fixed income, commodities, etc.
